column5: My friend is looking for a floater suit.  Just a plain jane model will do.  I have a Nautilus suit that I got a couple of years ago for around $200.  He wants something similar and in the same price range.  Anyone know where to get the best deal on one of these?  Thanks, Burt
PM Percher he always seems to find the deals.
I got a Halle Hansen (or whatever its called) at Grimsby Bait and Tackle a couple of years ago for not much over 200.00
try Burns ,on Plains road in Burlington.
Ditto...I got my Bouy-O-Bouy suit from Steve and it was $225 I think.  I wouldn't buy another one though...going to go with the higher-end Mustang when I replace this one.  Tony
